name: Deep dive into L2 deployed contracts
description: We built a search index of verified deployed contracts across L2s and study how L2 contracts differ from L1 contracts as well as the challenges of developing across L2s (optimistic / zkevms).

speakers.name: Ren Crypto Fish
speakers.bio: Ren is an engineer at Electric Capital who helped build the public good codeslaw.app, a code search engine for verified deployed contracts on Ethereum, Layer 2s, and other EVM chains that's used by security researchers and solidity developers.
